param.name: virtuemart_category_id
param.query: SELECT `a`.`virtuemart_category_id`, concat_ws('/',`b`.`category_name`,`a`.`category_name`) as name FROM `#__virtuemart_categories` as `a` left join `#__virtuemart_category_categories` as `x` on `x`.`category_child_id`=`a`.`virtuemart_category_id` left join `#__virtuemart_categories` as `b` on `x`.`category_parent_id`=`b`.`virtuemart_category_id` order by concat_ws('/',`b`.`category_name`,`a`.`category_name`)
